thread.title: In major reshuffle, cop in OROP protest crackdown row transferred
thread.title_full: In major reshuffle, cop in OROP protest crackdown row transferred | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: In major reshuffle, cop in OROP protest crackdown row transferred
text:
Other Articles With tear gas and razor wire, Macedonia tries to stem refugee tide Migrants seeking new routes to Britain, Eurotunnel says AAP stages protest against Surinder Singh's arrest In a major reshuffle, the Delhi Lt Governor today transferred 35 police officials including Deputy Commissioner of Police (New Delhi) Vijay Singh, who was involved in the crackdown on agitating army veterans demanding One-Rank-One-Pension (OROP) at Jantar Mantar here.
Singh has been transferred to the north-west district of Delhi Police, a senior police official said, adding Jatin Narwal, currently additional DCP in New Delhi district, will replace him.
In northwest district, Vijay Singh will replace DCP N Gnanasambandan, who has been transferred to the Police Training College as its new Vice-Principal, the official said.
The reshuffle included six officials of ACP rank who have been transferred on promotion, the official added.
 21, 2015 3:58 pm
